result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Ron L Snyder

records.addlTxt:
2:10 PM Defendant Ron L Snyder in court.  Attorney Mitchell John Philbin in court for State of Wisconsin. Atty Lee Schuchart appears on behalf of the Deft.
Court calls cases 22ct17, 22cm27, and 22fo60.
Copy of complaint on 117.
Atty Schuchart heard - deft understands.
Waives formal reading.
Enters not guilty pleas.
Requests to be appointed as a dean atty on the 117 case.
Court appoints Atty Schuchart.
Court schedules with parties.
2:12 PM
Status conference scheduled for November 29, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Dean Appt - Atty Schuchart, repayment at $75 per month, beginning 07-01-2022

records.descr: Pet for appointment counsel,affidavit of indigency

records.addlTxt:
2:03 PM Defendant Ron L Snyder in court.  Attorney robert James mraz in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Court calls cases 22CM27 and 22FO60.
Deft provides dean form to the court.
Court reviews form with deft.
Atty Schuchart is present and is heard - will take the case pending a conflict check.
ADA provides copy of complaint.
Court appoints Atty Schuchart.
Deft to repay dean fees at $75 per month beginning 07-01-2022.
Atty Schuchart heard - has reviewed complaint with deft.
Deft understands charges and penalties.
Waives formal readings.
Enters not guilty pleas.
Requests status.
Court schedules.
2:05 PM
Motion on postconviction relief hearing scheduled for September 12, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

2:13 PM Defendant Ron L Snyder in court.  Attorney robert James mraz in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Court calls cases 22cm27 and 22fo60.
Deft heard and does not know why his attorney is not here.
Court heard - atty has not filed a retainer.
Court schedules with parties.
2:14 PM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for May 23, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

01:54 PM Defendant Ron L Snyder in court.  robert James mraz appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Court calls case.
Deft heard.
Copy of complaint.
Court reviews charges and max penalties.
Court inquires on atty.
Deft to contact the PD's office today.
Deft heard - now has an occupational license.
Court heard - have 22FO60 track along with this case.
ADA heard on bond.
Deft heard.
Court imposes $1000 signature bond w/ conditions; sign waiver of extradition, no possession or consumption of alcohol or controlled substanes without a valid Rx, no opearting a motor vehilce without a valid license.
Court schedules with parties.
2:00 PM
  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for May 9, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

01:48 PM Defendant Ron L Snyder not in court.  robert James mraz appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Court calls case.
Deft does not appear.
ADA heard - deft was mailed, so no proof of service.
Requests the complaint be filed with a summons.
Court so orders.
1:50 PM
